column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The only thing I'd say that was a little annoying was the noise level. Sure
column3: and that's to be expected. However
column4: their PA system used to call out reservations is a little obnoxious. It's not only too loud
column5: but it also hits at a frequency that seems to pierce right through to your brain. So every time a table is called out
column6: you get a mini headache. I'd suggest to them maybe taking cellphone numbers down
column7: like a lot of restaurants are starting to do nowadays.
